page.title: 03FOOD IN THE 1980'S.
page.content: Most children today complain about school dinners. School dinners are becoming better planned with less greasy and fattening things included in the menu. There are more salads,more roast meals and the variety is quite large. Never the less most children would prefer{fish and chips}every day! Most children who have a packed lunch have slices of meat or meat spreads in their sandwiches, chocolate biscuits and cheese crackers are very popular and crisps are a must. People today often buy meals ready cooked these come from Chinese or Indian "take away"or the more traditional English fish and chip shops. Pre cooked meals heated quickly in microwave ovens also save time and effort for the house wife.
